trip_expired: This tour is probably already over.
trip_does_not_exist: This tour probably does not exist (anymore).
add_favorites: Add new stops as favorites by clicking on the star when opening the stop.
search_stop_vehicle: Search for a stop or a vehicle
no_entry: There seems to be no entry for your search.
where_is_my_bus: Where is my bus? Kiel-Live shows current departure times for all stops and the current position of your bus.
support_us: Support us by sharing the app with your friends and give us feedback!
no_bus_wants_to_stop_here_right_now: No bus wants to stop here right now.
this_stop_probably_does_not_exist: This stop probably does not exist.
update_msg: The new version should help you navigate through Kiel even better.
feedback: Feel free to send feedback to {email} and follow us on {instagram}
404_error: Whoa 404, either we broke something or you had a typing mishap :-/
logo_alt: Kiel-Live logo, the front of a bus with Manni written on it
changelog_rewrite_version_2: Completely new app with focus on the map
changelog_live_locations: Map with stop and live locations of all busses
changelog_alerts: Show alerts for stops and vehicles
lite_mode_description: If you enable the lite mode the data will be shown to you without the map. This allows you to save some data volume.
changelog_trips_path_lite_mode: Show the route of a selected bus on the map and new lite mode to save data volume
theme_description: Choose a theme that fits your needs.
contact_title: Would you like to share feedback, propose an idea, report an issue, or simply express gratitude? Your email would be greatly appreciated!
changelog_nok_ferry: Added schedule of the canal ferry Adler 1
